DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluate long-term safety Desvenlafaxine Succinate ( DVS ) Slow Release ( SR ) open-label treatment adult outpatient primary diagnosis major depressive disorder ( MDD ) . The study also evaluate long-term response subject receive DVS SR clinical global evaluation , functionality , general well-being , pain , absence depressive symptom ( remission ) .
DOC.brief_title: Long-Term Safety Of DVS-233 SR In Patients With Major Depressive Disorder
DOC.criteria: Outpatients complete doubleblind therapy phase 3 DVS233 SR shortterm study indication MDD , include schedule evaluation , major protocol violation study event , opinion investigator , would preclude subject 's entry longterm , openlabel study . Sexually active individual participate study must use medically acceptable form contraception trial least 15 day last dose study drug . Clinically important abnormality baseline physical examination , unresolved clinically significant abnormality ECG , laboratory test result , vital sign record previous phase 3 DVS233 SR shortterm study indication MDD . Any exception must discuss grant sponsor . Significant risk suicide base clinical judgment , include common suicidal thought , suicide consider possible solution , even without specific plan intention . Presence clinically important hepatic renal disease medical disease might compromise study detrimental subject ( eg , clinically important cardiac arrhythmia , uncontrolled diabetes , uncontrolled hypertension , seizure disorder , myocardial infarction , neurologic disorder , acute illness , neoplastic disorder ) .
